cleaningService.title: Professional House Cleaning
cleaningService.description: Complete house cleaning service with professional equipment and eco-friendly products. We clean every corner of your house to leave it spotless.
cleaningService.requirements: Access to water and electricity required. Please ensure pets are secured during cleaning.

plumbingService.title: Emergency Plumbing Repair
plumbingService.description: Fast and reliable plumbing repair service available 24/7. We fix leaks, unclog drains, and repair fixtures.
plumbingService.requirements: Access to plumbing area required. Additional costs may apply for parts and materials.

electricalService.title: Electrical Installation & Repair
electricalService.description: Licensed electrician for all your electrical needs. Installation, repair, and maintenance of electrical systems.
electricalService.requirements: Must turn off main electrical breaker before service. Safety equipment will be provided.

gardeningService.title: Garden Maintenance & Landscaping
gardeningService.description: Complete garden care including pruning, weeding, planting, and landscape design. Transform your outdoor space.
gardeningService.requirements: Access to garden area and water source required. Weather dependent service.
